response.original_title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
response.overview: A couple vacationing in Morocco with their young son accidentally stumble upon an assassination plot. When the child is kidnapped to ensure their silence, they have to take matters into their own hands to save him.
response.tagline: A little knowledge can be a deadly thing!
response.title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
